post.title: samsung vibrant from tmobile internet problem
post.content: so i have a samsung vibrant from tmobile unlocked. i can browse the web but i cant connect to any email servers nor can i download anything from the internet. phone and txt is working fine. i used these settings rogers-core-appl1.apn wapuser1 wap mms http://mms.gprs.rogers.com 10.128.1.59 80 mmc 302 702 any ideas what's wrong? cheers
